item.title: Instalando ROracle en R/Rstudio para Windows
item.description: Una pequeña guía para instalar el driver de Oracle en R e interactuar con Oracle RMDB desde R/Rstudio

item.title: About me
item.description: My life is a work in progress, but currently I’m living in the Dominican Republic. I have been a variety of roles in the IT industry, like DBA, Sysadmin, Backend engineer, Data analyst/engineer, but now I’m working as a DevOps Engineer. I like the alcohol (mostly beer and whisky) and talk about Tech Industry, movies and music (from the Dominican Dembow to Norwegian Black Metal, I don’t fave frontiers). You can find me in almost every Social Network/games (if I play it , of course) as @jeasoft.
